title: CLEAR_WEATHER_TYPE_NOW_PERSIST_NETWORK
content:
0x0CF97F497FE7D048// ClearWeatherTypeNowPersistNetwork
void CLEAR_WEATHER_TYPE_NOW_PERSIST_NETWORK(int transitionTimeInMs);Parameters:transitionTimeInMs: Transition time in milliseconds.Clears the active weather type after a specific amount of time determined by transitionTimeInMs.Examples:LuaRegisterCommand('weathertransition', function(source, args)
    -- Set the weather type to foggy so we can see the change
    SetWeatherTypeNowPersist("FOGGY")
    -- Clear the weather and run the transition
    local transitionTimeInMs = tonumber(args[1]) or 5000
    if transitionTimeInMs > 0 then
        ClearWeatherTypeNowPersistNetwork(transitionTimeInMs)
    end
end, false)
codeBlocks:
